meanings.sent1: The group of lummoxes tripped over each other at the park.
meanings.sent2: The classroom was filled with lummoxes who couldn't solve the simple math problem.
meanings.sent3: The lummoxes tried to juggle eggs but ended up dropping them all.
meanings.sent4: The team of lummoxes in the relay race moved as if they were carrying heavy weights.
meanings.sent5: The lummoxes at the party kept bumping into furniture and spilling drinks.

meanings.definition: To act in a clumsy or awkward manner.
meanings.sent1: She lummoxes around the kitchen, knocking over pots and pans.
meanings.sent2: The puppy lummoxes through the garden, trampling the flowers.
meanings.sent3: He lummoxes his way through the dance floor, stepping on toes left and right.
meanings.sent4: The robot lummoxes across the room, bumping into walls and furniture.
meanings.sent5: The toddler lummoxes around the playground, stumbling over his own feet.
